EmailTemplate.description: Notification e-mail HTML sent when a case is logged for E&F Services by email (English)
EmailTemplate.name: E&F_Case confirmation - online HTML (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Note that this is an auto-reply message. Please do not respond to this email.
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your enquiry. One of our Customer Service Representatives will respond to you shortly.
You have been allocated the following case number: # {!Case.CaseNumber}. Please quote this case number as a reference if you wish to contact us regarding your enquiry.
Best regards, IATA E&F Services
{!Case.Thread_Id}
